data.title: List of prime ministers of Canada by date of death
data.text:
This is a complete list of Canadian prime ministers by date of death.

John A. Macdonald and John Thompson were the only prime ministers to die in office. Four prime ministers have died outside of Canada; three in the United Kingdom and one in the United States.[citation needed] Richard Bennett is the only prime minister to be buried outside of Canada.[1]

See also: State funerals in Canada
